description:
A cozy onesie that is as soft as their favourite teddy bear and made from recycled materials. Crafted from ultra-plush fleece, this onesie is warm, light and easy to clean.

  • Midweight fleece holds in the warmth and is super-soft
  • Low-profile 3-piece hood has ears for a little extra cuteness
  • Elastic piping at the hem and cuffs
  • Convenient asymmetric zip with draft flap is easy to get on and off
  • Fold over cuffs and ankles keep little hands and feet toasty
  • Internal ID label makes daycare pick-ups smoother
name: The North Face Bear One Piece - Infants
